library.name: A Comprehensive Bibliography on Syriac Studies

bib: Apostolache, Ioni ţă. “Dimensiunea eclesiologică a tainei baptismaleîn imnografia siro-occidentală.‘Imn la Epifanie despre Biserică, Mireasă a lui Hristos.’” Revista Teologică 96:1 (2014): 25–41.
citation: Ioni ţă Apostolache, “Dimensiunea eclesiologică a tainei baptismaleîn imnografia siro-occidentală.‘Imn la Epifanie despre Biserică, Mireasă a lui Hristos,’” Revista Teologică 96:1 (2014): 25–41.

data.title: Dimensiunea eclesiologică a tainei baptismaleîn imnografia siro-occidentală.“Imn la Epifanie despre Biserică, Mireasă a lui Hristos”
data.abstractNote:
The Syrian Traditions offers many
                    symbolical ways of interpretation in Christian theology. In our study we have
                    tried to discover the most important aspects of the dogmatic and mystical
                    symbols of the Heavenly Bridegroom and the bridal chamber. In this respect, we
                    try to analyze one baptismal hymn, written by an anonymous father. This text was
                    translated from English. It is also very interesting the connection between the
                    Sacrament of Baptism and the Christian symbols form the book "Song of
                    Songs". His allegorical dimension is demonstrated in Origen and Saint
                    Gregory's commentary. We tried to develop a very interesting subject, less
                    analyzed in our theology. In conclusion, our work is supported by the great
                    importance of the Syriac Theology, permanently in connection and dialogue with
                    the world of Greek writings and concepts.
